comments: Sangjib is a perfectly intelligle lecturer. He has a tireless work ethic and is always willing to assist students outside of class.

I seriously don\'t understand what these other people are complaining about. Professor Kim was very helpful in class and during office hours, and always explained concepts and problems well. He has an accent sure, but it isn\'t hard to understand, and can be pretty funny at times when he pronounces certain words. I would recommend him to anyone.

Poor clarity of explanations of concepts, accomplishes very little in classes, must teach yourself what is going on with a useless textbook...material is not terribly difficult if you find another resource to teach yourself.

I dont know what the one person is talking about. This guy is does have an accent, but if you just listen and watch him, and or go to his office hours you\'re good for an A. I missed a lot of classes too... his tests are fair and i actually found calculus fun because of him!
OMG!! loved this man!! he is so sweet and nice! he\'ll give you an A if you try hard and go to his office hours!

Stephen Hawking\'s speech box has more of an excited tone to it than this guy has with his voice. Kim blends soul deadening tone with a THICK accent, a snooze worthy slurry "navigating" you through calculus. As if this jumble wasn\'t bad enough, he gets pissed at you (in the slow-motion action sequence way)if ANYONE asks a question in class.AVOID!!!
